markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Seedpod](/Feats.aspx?ID=1041) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 54 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your body produces a nearly endless supply of hard seedpods. You gain a seedpod ranged [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack with a [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) of 10 feet that deals 1d4 bludgeoning damage; these Strikes have the [manipulate](/Actions.aspx?ID=639) trait. On a critical hit, a seedpod bursts, issuing forth a tangle of vegetation that imposes a –10-foot circumstance penalty on the target's Speed for 1 round. Seedpods do not add critical specialization effects.

<title level="2">Seedpod leads to...</title>
[Thorned Seedpod](/Feats.aspx?ID=2396)
name: Seedpod
